Perkiomen Valley Schools added 10 new photos.
January 9 at 2:52 PM ·

Mieke and Dover Wilmoth were expecting a regular day at school until both of them received a surprise visitor to their classrooms at Evergreen and Middle School West - their father, Maj. Jamey Wilmoth! Maj. Wilmoth has just completed a tour in Afghanistan, where he was serving on a Forward Surgical Team as a nurse anesthetist. This was Maj. Wilmoth's fourth tour as part of his 13 years in the Army. He surprised both his children with a visit to school on Thursday, and spent some time talking with students about his role overseas. Maj. Wilmoth had been deployed since October and wasn't expected home until later, so both his children were overjoyed to see him after long months apart. Thank you for your service, Maj. Wilmoth, and welcome home!
